issue.title: [CF 1087] How is possible to tract CD (external) with charges (Hand of Sacriface, etc...)
issue.body:
Hi, can sou help me? Is it possible, and how? I can track successfully CD of some spell on some unit, but I am unable to process charges.

Thanks.


> Posted by CurseForge user Achse_ | Imported from CurseForge issue #1087 | Raw
